snippet.title: Sonic Generations - Unleashed Project - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally here! Check out our ModDB Page for downloads and instructions. 
http://www.moddb.com/mods/sonic-generations-unleashed-project

60 FPS version of this Trailer:
https://mega.co.nz/#!GJIRCIzQ!DKnB2mlH1SGJE_JJtk5oP2MydetIpA-0mxM0wb9q0xY
http://rapidshare.com/files/3471287539/Final%20Trailer%2060%20FPS%20Web%20Version-muxed.mp4

Song used for this Trailer - "Unleashed Project - Release Trailer" - by Falk:
https://soundcloud.com/falk-2/unleashed-project-trailer
https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B1CzI_WhoSoCd19zS3ZTc2ZSRG8/edit

Thanks for your support over all these months, like/favourite if you appreciate our work, subscribe to keep up with any updates, and most importantly... play it!

Most of the questions you have are probably answered in the ModDB page, so please read that before reporting any issues you have. And if you do have an important issue, make sure to be as detailed as possible in your description. ("I crashed in this very vague situation, halp!" is not good)

Any quick bugfix updates that need to be done will be made via the online updater built into SonicGMI.
